Top 5 Youtube Browser

This project displays top5 Youtube result from your search term. The data is being fetched from the external Youtube API. Some of key features you might be interested in from this work are:

  • React.js
  • Fetching Youtube API with Axios
  • Semantic UI
  • HTML5 and CSS3

*Please note that there is a daily quota limit for using the API, so please use this app for the demo purpose only.

Toby's Portfolio

This project is my portfolio that you are currently visiting. This portfolio showcases my various works and expeirences in website designs and programming skills. Some of key features you might be interested in from this work are:

  • HTML5 & Advanced CSS3 with many effects and animations!!!
  • JavaScript
  • SASS
  • Fully Responsive Design

Chuck Norris Joke Generator

This project is demonstraing the use of external API. I used 'API|The Internet Chuck Norris Database' from http://www.icndb.com/api/. A user can fetch the number of Chuck Norris jokes. Some of key features you might be interested in from this work are:

  • HTML5 & CSS3
  • Simple Grid and Flexbox
  • JavaScript with Fetch API

To-Do App

This is a famous To-Do app and I created this app using React.js. A user can add, delete, and edit a task.

  • React.js
  • HTML5
  • Bootstrap
  • UUID
  • Font Awesome
